page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR GAME IS LURKY.ON SOME DAYS ALL THE CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL WILL PLAY. ONE PERSON STANDS AT THE LURKY POST (WE USE A DRAIN PIPE)THEY COUNT TO 200 IN FIVES WITH THEIR EYES CLOSED AND EVERYONE ELSE HIDES.THEN THE COUNTER LOOKS FOR THOSE WHO ARE HIDING.THE COUNTER AND HIDERS RACE TO BE FIRST BACK TO THE LURKY POST.TIG IS ANOTHER POPULAR GAME.IT IS A CHASING GAME.SOMETIMES WE ALL BRING ROLLER BOOTS AND PLAY TIG ON ROLLER BOOTS.THE BOYS OFTEN PLAY FOOTBALL AND THEY HAVE TWO SMALL GOALPOSTS.WE HAVE TO BE CAREFUL WITH BALL GAMES BECAUSE THE RAILWAY IS SO NEAR.THE YOUNGER CHILDREN PLAY A LOT OF PRETEND GAMES BASED ON TELEVISION PROGRAMMES OR FILMS.THEY RACE AROUND PRETENDING TO BE HE MAN OR SOMEONE OUT OF STARWARS. IF OUR BALLS GO OVER NOW THE RAILWAYMEN THROW THEM BACK SOMETIMES.
